name: Mochi the Digger
description:
Mochi the Digger is a top-down game written in Lua and run on Love2D inspired by the DOS PC game Digger from 1983. It was submitted as my final project for Harvard GD50. 

Use the arrow keys to dig your way around each level and eat all of the fruit while avoiding slimes and the evil cat! Press Escape to exit the game during game play.

To launch the game, you will need Love2D. Follow instructions here:

https://love2d.org/wiki/Getting_Started
